snippet: A newly discovered chemical substance allows young mice to ward off the sexual advances of older mice.
abstract: Study in journal Nature reports discovery of pheromone, called ESP22, that young mice use to ward off sexual advances from older ones.
lead_paragraph: A newly discovered chemical substance allows young mice to ward off the sexual advances of older mice.

headline.main: How Young Mice Tell Older Ones, ‘Get Lost’
headline.print_headline: Animal Behavior: How Young Mice Tell Older Ones, ‘Get Lost’
